blogPost.excerpt: Accesstype empowers publishers with the ability to move to datawalls and paywalls that increase audience loyalty and generate predictable reader revenue. Available on WordPress and Bold CMS
blogPost.body: Accesstype empowers publishers with the ability to move to datawalls and paywalls that increase audience loyalty and generate predictable reader revenue. Available on WordPress and Bold CMS
blogPost.title: Accesstype - Monetize content with paywalls and content subscriptions
blogPost.author: Susanna Varghese

localize.description: Accesstype使出版商有能力转向数据墙和付费墙，以提高受众的忠诚度并产生可预测的读者收入。可在WordPress和Bold CMS上使用
localize.tagline: 通过付费墙和内容订阅来实现内容的货币化。

localize.description: Accesstype使出版商有能力轉向數據牆和付費牆，以提高受衆的忠誠度併產生可預測的讀者收入。可在WordPress和Bold CMS上使用
localize.tagline: 通過付費牆和內容訂閱來實現內容的貨幣化。

previous.excerpt: With this templated UX audit checklist, you can uncover 90% of the usability issues on your website or app. It includes over 100 unique criteria & is totally free! ⠀ Because it's a Notion pack, you can duplicate, customize & use it forever. ♾️
